title: A new Israeli-Palestinian restaurant promotes peace through food in Paris
subhead: Edgar Laloum and Radjaa Aboudagga have just opened Sababa in Paris, offering bicultural culinary specialties. The two partners hope that, through the joys of culinary arts, they can help foster understanding and peace between communities.

title: Fate of Palestinian leader Marwan Barghouti remains uncertain
subhead: The former leader of the Second Intifada, imprisoned in Israel for 23 years, was not among the prisoners released in exchange for Israeli hostages. Seen as a unifying figure and resistance fighter, he is regarded as the leading successor to Mahmoud Abbas, the aging president of the Palestinian Authority.
byline: Jacques Follorou and  Marie Jo Sader

title: How Gustave Courbet's 'Le Désespéré' came to be owned by Qatar
